General.Name: Monex S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Monex, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, provides various financial services to individuals and companies. The company's products and services include foreign exchange and payments, letters of credit, short-term credit facilities, digital accounts, investment funds, trusts, derivatives and structured notes, financial advisory, securities investment, international investments, as well as digital currency trading platforms and insurance products. It also provides foreign exchange trading, cash management, business credit, stock brokerage, private advice, certificates of term deposit, asset management, and promissory notes with yield payable at maturity services; credit products and international trade services; risk management products and services comprises options, institutional savings and personal retirement plans, forwards, swaps, and futures; and leasing products for transportation-related assets, and machinery and equipment. In addition, the company is involved in the individualization of funds and savings banks; analysis and issuance of investment recommendations, promotion or commercialize of securities, money transfer transactions; currency buying/selling, and management of investment portfolios; and mobile and electronic banking services. It operates a network of 32 offices in Mexico, 6 offices in the United States, 1 office in Canada, 1 office in the United Kingdom, 1 office in Spain, 1 office in the Netherlands, 1 office in Singapore, and 1 office in Luxembourg. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Av. Paseo de la Reforma No. 284, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 06600
